mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.trade_id AS "tradeId", a.trade_type AS "tradeType", a.trade_direction AS "tradeDirection", a.trade_amount AS "tradeAmount", a.payee_name AS "payeeName", a.payee_type AS "payeeType", a.trade_status AS "tradeStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", at3.attachment_path as "rentContractReceiptFile", at2.attachment_path as "depositReceiptFile", case when a.trade_type=0 then tlc.contract_name when a.trade_type=1 or a.trade_type =2 then ta.agreement_name else tc.contract_name end tradeName, case when a.trade_type=0 then tlc.contract_code when a.trade_type=1 or a.trade_type =2 then ta.agreement_code else tc.contract_code end tradeObjectNo, case when a.trade_type=0 then tlc.contract_status when a.trade_type=1 or a.trade_type =2 then ta.agreement_status else tc.contract_status end transStatus, case when a.trade_type=1 or a.trade_type=2 then ta.agreement_busi_status else tc.contract_busi_status end transBusiStatus, tc.data_source as "contractDataSource", ta.data_source as "agreementDataSource"

left join t_deposit_agreement ta on a.trade_id=ta.id left join t_rent_contract tc on a.trade_id=tc.id left join t_lease_contract tlc on a.trade_id = tlc.id left join t_attachment at2 on a.id=at2.trading_accounts_id and at2.attachment_type='15' and at2.del_flag='0' left join t_attachment at3 on a.id=at3.trading_accounts_id and at3.attachment_type='17' and at3.del_flag='0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_trading_accounts( id, trade_id, trade_type, trade_direction, trade_amount, payee_name, payee_type, trade_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{tradeId}, #{tradeType}, #{tradeDirection}, #{tradeAmount}, #{payeeName}, #{payeeType}, #{tradeStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_trading_accounts SET trade_id = #{tradeId}, trade_type = #{tradeType}, trade_direction = #{tradeDirection}, trade_amount = #{tradeAmount}, payee_name = #{payeeName}, payee_type = #{payeeType}, trade_status = #{tradeStatus}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
